item.title: 美国第一季度经济增长放缓幅度超过预期
item.description: 美国第一季度的经济增长放缓幅度超过预期，但通胀加速表明，美联储不会在 9 月前降息。【原文：U.S. economic growth slowed more than expected in the first quarter, but an acceleration in inflation suggested that the Federal Reserve would not cut interest rates before September.】

item.title: 由于价格上涨和对无烟替代品的强劲需求，Altria 第一季度销售额位居榜首
item.description: 受价格上涨和对传统烟草产品替代品需求上升的推动，奥特里亚集团（Altria Group）周四公布的季度销售额超出预期。【原文：Altria Group topped quarterly sales expectations on Thursday, driven by higher pricing and rising demand for alternatives to conventional tobacco products.】

item.title: KKR 将从 Blackstone 的房地产投资信托基金手中购买 16.4 亿美元的学生公寓投资组合
item.description: 私募股权投资公司 KKR 周四表示，已同意以约 16.4 亿美元的价格从 Blackstone Real Estate Income Trust 购买由 19 处学生公寓物业组成的投资组合。【原文：Private equity firm KKR has agreed to buy a portfolio of 19 student housing properties from Blackstone Real Estate Income Trust for about $1.64 billion, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 亚马逊将在印第安纳州投资 110 亿美元建设数据中心
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）的云计算部门表示，将在印第安纳州投资 110 亿美元建设数据中心，这是该州最大的资本投资，并承诺至少提供 1000 个工作岗位。【原文：Amazon.com's cloud-computing arm said it would invest $11 billion in Indiana to build data centers, marking the state's largest capital investment, and promising at least 1,000 jobs.】

item.title: 产品需求强劲，标普全球第一季度利润超预期
item.description: 由于 "软着陆 "的希望刺激投资者在数据和分析产品上投入更多资金，S&P Global周四公布的第一季度利润超过了市场预期。【原文：S&P Global on Thursday beat Street estimates for its first-quarter profit, as hopes of a "soft landing" spurred investors to spend more on data and analytics products】

item.title: 铁路运营商联合太平洋公司公布季度利润持平
item.description: 铁路运营商联合太平洋公司周四公布的季度利润同比基本持平，原因是强劲的定价抵消了较低的运量，尤其是煤炭运量。【原文：Railroad operator Union Pacific reported mostly flat quarterly profit year-over-year on Thursday, as strong pricing offset lower volumes, particularly in coal.】

item.title: 企业支出限制抑制咨询需求，IBM业绩下滑
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines）的股票在周四的盘前交易中下跌超过 8%，原因是其咨询业务面临着企业紧缩预算以应对不确定的经济和高利率的压力。【原文：Shares of International Business Machines fell more than 8% in premarket trading on Thursday, as its consulting business faces pressure from enterprises tightening their budgets to cope with an uncertain economy and high interest rates.】

item.title: 由于需求稳定和价格上涨，Keurig Dr Pepper 第一季度业绩喜人
item.description: 饮料生产商 Keurig Dr Pepper 周四公布的第一季度销售额和利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于对高价苏打水和奎宁水的稳定需求。【原文：Beverage maker Keurig Dr Pepper beat Wall Street expectations for first-quarter sales and profit on Thursday, helped by steady demand for its high-priced sodas and tonic water.】

item.title: 由于利息收入强劲，SVB 所有者第一公民公司的利润超出预期
item.description: 第一公民银行（First Citizens BancShares）第一季度利润超出预期，原因是该银行获得了更高的利息收入，并从去年收购硅谷银行（SVB）中获益。【原文：First Citizens BancShares' first-quarter profit beat expectations as the lender earned higher interest income and reaped the benefits of its acquisition of Silicon Valley Bank (SVB) last year.】

item.title: 刚果（金）律师就矿产供应链问题向苹果公司施压
item.description: 刚果聘请的国际律师周四表示，刚果民主共和国正敦促苹果公司提供有关其供应链的信息，因为担心苹果公司的供应链可能沾染了来自该国的冲突矿产。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo is pushing Apple Inc for information about its supply chain over concerns it may be tainted with conflict minerals sourced from the country, international lawyers engaged by Congo said on Thursday.】

item.title: 墨西哥水泥生产商 Cemex 一季度利润攀升，尽管销量有所下降
item.description: 墨西哥水泥生产商墨西哥水泥公司（Cemex）周四公布，尽管营业利润有所下降，但第一季度净利润增长了 13%，主要得益于税率降低和金融衍生品风险减少。【原文：Mexican cement-maker Cemex reported a 13% increase in first-quarter net profit on Thursday, bolstered by lower taxes and less exposure to financial derivatives, although its operating earnings declined.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔第一季度业绩超预期，航空业表现强劲
item.description: 霍尼韦尔周四公布的第一季度业绩超出华尔街预期，原因是其航空业务的强劲表现抵消了该公司工业和楼宇自动化部门增长放缓的影响。【原文：Honeywell beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter results on Thursday as strength in its aviation business offset a slowdown in the company's industrial and building automation units.】

item.title: 检测需求强劲，Labcorp 季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 本周四，Labcorp 第一季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是对特殊测试需求的增长促进了其诊断业务的销售。【原文：Labcorp beat Wall Street expectations for first-quarter profit on Thursday, as growing demand for specialty tests boosted sales at its diagnostics business.】

item.title: 纽蒙特公司季度利润超出预期
item.description: 纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp）周四公布的第一季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，因为这家全球最大的黄金矿商受益于强劲的产量。【原文：Newmont Corp beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Thursday, as the world's largest gold miner benefited from strong production.】

item.title: 美国航空公司预计第二季度利润大幅高于预期
item.description: 美国航空公司周四预测，由于商务旅行反弹以及对即将到来的夏季旺季需求的预期，本季度利润将大大高于分析师的预期。【原文：American Airlines forecast current-quarter profit largely above analysts' expectations on Thursday, amid a rebound in business travel and expectations of strong demand in the upcoming summer season.】

item.title: 康卡斯特因流媒体业务增长和公园入场人数激增而收入超出预期
item.description: 受孔雀流媒体服务用户增长高于预期以及主题公园入园人数激增的影响，康卡斯特周四的季度营收超出预期。【原文：Comcast beat quarterly revenue estimates on Thursday driven by higher-than-expected subscriber growth at its Peacock streaming service and strong attendance at its theme parks.】

item.title: 纳斯达克因金融科技产品需求强劲而实现营收增长
item.description: 纳斯达克周四公布的第一季度营收超出预期，这主要得益于交易员和投资者对其用于导航资本市场的金融技术产品的强劲需求。【原文：Nasdaq beat estimates for first-quarter revenue on Thursday, driven by strong demand for its financial technology products used by traders and investors to navigate the capital markets.】

item.title: 百时美施贵宝公布季度亏损，收入增长 5
item.description: 布里斯托尔-迈尔斯-施贵宝公司（Bristol Myers Squibb）周四公布了第一季度亏损报告，原因是该公司最近对 Karuna Therapeutics、RayzeBio 和 Mirati Therapeutics 的收购费用抵消了 5%的收入增长。【原文：Bristol Myers Squibb on Thursday reported a first-quarter loss as charges related to its recent acquisitions of Karuna Therapeutics, RayzeBio and Mirati Therapeutics offset a 5% increase in revenue.】

item.title: 哈雷戴维森公司季度利润因需求放缓而下降
item.description: 哈雷戴维森公司（Harley-Davidson）周四公布的第一季度利润下降了 23%，原因是北美地区的摩托车销售缓慢，高昂的借贷成本阻碍了潜在买家购买昂贵的摩托车。【原文：Harley-Davidson posted a 23% decline in first-quarter profit on Thursday, hurt by slow sales of its motorcycles in North America as high borrowing costs deter potential buyers from making expensive purchases.】

item.title: 雷普索尔公司首席执行官：努力完成在美国的首次 "可再生资产轮换
item.description: 雷普索尔公司首席执行官约苏-乔恩-伊马兹（Josu Jon Imaz）周四表示，作为资产轮换战略的一部分，公司正在努力与美国的可再生合作伙伴达成第一份协议。【原文：Repsol Chief Executive Josu Jon Imaz said on Thursday that the company is working to close the first agreement with a renewable partner in the U.S. as part of its asset rotation strategy.】

item.title: 价格上涨抵消需求放缓，卡特彼勒利润增长
item.description: 卡特彼勒（Caterpillar）周四公布季度利润增长，原因是其建筑设备价格上涨，而需求从去年的繁荣期有所回落。【原文：Caterpillar posted a rise in quarterly profit on Thursday as it held on to higher prices for its construction equipment as demand eased from last year's boom.】

item.title: 西南航空公司再次下调波音公司的喷气机交付预测
item.description: 西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）周四表示，该公司预计波音公司 2024 年的新飞机交付量将少于此前预期的一半，并将采取措施紧缩成本，如自愿休假计划，以作为缓冲。【原文：Southwest Airlines said on Thursday it anticipates less than half of the new aircraft deliveries it had previously expected from Boeing in 2024 and will take measures to tighten costs, such as voluntary time off programs, as a buffer.】

item.title: 拉扎德因资产激增实现第一季度盈利
item.description: 拉扎德（Lazard）周四公布第一季度盈利，而去年同期则出现亏损，这主要得益于这家精品投资银行的资产增长。【原文：Lazard reported a first-quarter profit on Thursday, compared with a loss a year earlier, buoyed by a growth in assets at the boutique investment bank.】

item.title: 游轮需求激增，皇家加勒比提升年度利润预期
item.description: 受益于创纪录的游轮需求和强劲的船上消费，皇家加勒比集团周四第二次上调了年度利润预期。【原文：Royal Caribbean Group on Thursday raised its annual profit forecast for a second time, benefiting from record demand for cruises and robust onboard spending.】

item.title: 为支持公务机扩产，庞巴迪因库存增加而消耗更多现金
item.description: 庞巴迪（Bombardier）周四公布第一季度现金消耗增加，原因是这家加拿大飞机制造商在私人飞行需求恢复的情况下增加库存，以支持公务机的增产。【原文：Bombardier reported higher first-quarter cash burn on Thursday as the Canadian planemaker builds up inventory to support increased production of business jets amid resilient demand for private flying.】

item.title: 默克上调 2024 年盈利预期，癌症和 HPV 药物销售强劲
item.description: 默克公司（Merck & Co）周四上调了其年度利润和收入预期，原因是其大片抗癌药物Keytruda和人类乳头瘤病毒（HPV）疫苗加卫苗（Gardasil）销售强劲。【原文：Merck & Co on Thursday raised its annual profit and revenue forecast on the back of strong sales for its blockbuster cancer drug Keytruda and human papillomavirus (HPV) vaccine Gardasil.】

item.title: 早间竞标：Meta 暴跌，大型矿业并购曝光
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 化学品制造商陶氏季度利润超出预期
item.description: 化学制品制造商陶氏周四公布的第一季度利润超出预期，原因是全球制造业活动出现增长迹象，销售量增加。【原文：Chemicals maker Dow beat first-quarter profit estimates on Thursday, helped by higher sales volumes as global manufacturing activity shows signs of growth.】

item.title: 乌克兰和以色列法案将增加洛克希德公司和 RTX 公司的利润
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin Corp）和 RTX 公司（RTX Corp）因俄罗斯入侵乌克兰和加沙战争而订单激增，它们将从 950 亿美元的大部分新武器资金中获利，因为日益旷日持久的冲突重新激发了对昂贵设备的需求。【原文：Lockheed Martin Corp and RTX Corp , fresh off a surge of orders in response to Russian aggression against Ukraine and the war in Gaza, stand to profit from $95 billion of mostly new weapons funding as the increasingly drawn out conflicts renew demand for pricey equipment.】

item.title: 贝莱德支持的 "去碳化伙伴 "为首期基金募集 14 亿美元资金
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）与新加坡国家投资公司淡马锡（Temasek）合作成立的专注于气候问题的投资者 "去碳化伙伴"（Decarbonization Partners）周四表示，该公司已为其首支基金募集到高于目标的 14 亿美元资金。【原文：Climate-focused investor Decarbonization Partners, a tie-up between BlackRock and Singaporean state investment firm Temasek, said on Thursday it had raised a higher-than-targeted $1.4 billion for its first fund.】
